feels.name: Anxiety
feels.quote: The ghosts were returning; they filled Italy, they were even usurping the places she had known as a child. The Sacred Lake would never be the same again, and, on Sunday week, something would even happen to Windy Corner. How would she fight against ghosts? For a moment the visible world faded away, and memories and emotions alone seemed real.

feels.name: Regret
feels.quote: How dreadful if she really wished to remain near him! Of course, the wish was due to nerves, which love to play such perverse tricks upon us.

feels.name: Nostalgia
feels.quote: The Sacred Lake would never be the same again, and, on Sunday week, something would even happen to Windy Corner.

feels.name: Irritation
feels.quote: Cecil frowned again. Oh, these Honeychurches! Eggs, boilers, hydrangeas, maidsâ€”of such were their lives compact.

Places.name: Dining_room
